title: AI People | Autonomous NPC Interactions
author: NVIDIA GeForce

key_facts: AI People offers a generative AI sandbox for interactive gameplay with autonomous NPCs.
NPCs respond to text or voice input from players in real time.
NPCs have dynamic choices and emotions that evolve during interactions.
Stories emerge organically without fixed plots or predetermined outcomes.
NPCs maintain consistency through long-term memory across sessions.
Players can use an integrated editor to shape NPC lives and create narratives.
Pre-made and community-created stories are available for play.
Game sessions generate fresh, original, and continuously evolving narratives.
Players can choose between online and local large language models to power NPCs.
The system supports both text and voice-based player inputs.
Autonomous NPCs interact with the environment and other NPCs dynamically.
Narratives are driven by AI and user-generated content.
Each session is unique and not repeatable due to emergent storytelling.
The platform enables creative expression through customizable NPC development.
Long-term memory ensures continuity in NPC behavior and story progression.
key_opinions: The lack of fixed plots makes the experience more engaging and unpredictable.
The integration of an editor empowers users to become storytellers.
Community-made stories add valuable diversity and creativity to the game.
Local LLMs offer better privacy and control over NPC behavior.
Voice input enhances immersion compared to text-only interaction.
Emergent storytelling creates deeper emotional investment.
The system's adaptability makes it ideal for experimental narrative design.
Long-term memory significantly improves NPC believability.
User-driven content fosters a vibrant and collaborative ecosystem.
The freedom to shape narratives encourages creative experimentation.
